Question: This person was honorably discharged in early 1945, just prior to Japan's surrender.
Hints: Brother Robert and Ted Sorenson pressed this person to take more initiative on the legislative front.
In July 1963, this person sent Averell Harriman to Moscow to negotiate a treaty with the Soviets.
Details of this person's health problems in which he struggled have become better known, especially since the 1990s.
